name: Turbo Chopper Simulator
overview: TURBO CHOPPER SIMULATOR. CODE MASTERS. Real helicopter combat at its best! Select your weapons - Guided Missiles, Bouncing Bombs or Heat Seeking K22's. Destroy Ammo Dumps, Chemical Plants, Floating Generators, Gun Emplacements, Tanks and Aircraft! Also Includes Special Turbo Boost Feature!!! Brilliant Gameplay, brilliant fun!
